summary.span: 显示 控件的内容。

span.span: Displays the content of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了样式的各个组件的支持控件。The class provides support for styling the various components of a control. 璝惠体内的滚动区域，请参阅。For information about the scrolling region inside a , see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用设置的内容的样式控件。The following example demonstrates how to use a to style the content of a control. span.span: The that becomes visible.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 标识要使其可见的坐标空间的边框。

span.span: The bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.

summary.span: 强制内容滚动，直至 对象的坐标空间可见。

span.span: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a object is visible.
A that represents the visible region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下，返回是转换的输入的矩形的版本。In most cases, the returned is a transformed version of the input rectangle. 在某些情况下，例如当输入的矩形不能完全适合视区内，返回的值可能较小。In some cases, such as when the input rectangle cannot fit entirely within the viewport, the return value may be smaller.
